Rulings.Tengu: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.Goat: No rulings found for this card. Request new rulings at https://discord.gg/shVJnYJNpg
Rulings.HAT:
● The effect to gain an additional Normal Summon is an "Unclassified Effect". 
It applies immediately after this card is Successfully Summoned, and won't be negated by "Effect Veiler".
However, if "Skill Drain" is already applying when this card is Summoned, it will be negated.
● If you control this card and "Constellar Leonis", you only get 1 additional Summon, not 2.
Rulings.Vegas:
● The effect to gain an additional Normal Summon is an "Unclassified Effect". 
It applies immediately after this card is Successfully Summoned, and won't be negated by "Effect Veiler".
However, if "Skill Drain" is already applying when this card is Summoned, it will be negated.
● If you control this card and "Constellar Leonis", you only get 1 additional Summon, not 2.
Rulings.Meadowlands:
● You only get the extra Normal Summon while this card remains face-up on the field and while this effect is not being negated. For example, if this card is destroyed by “Trap Hole”, you don’t get the extra Normal Summon (this was an event-specific ruling).
● If you control this card and "Constellar Leonis", you only get 1 additional Summon, not 2.
Rulings.FireWater:
● The effect to gain an additional Normal Summon is an "Unclassified Effect". 
It applies immediately after this card is Successfully Summoned, and won't be negated by "Effect Veiler".
However, if "Skill Drain" is already applying when this card is Summoned, it will be negated.
● If you control this card and "Constellar Leonis", you only get 1 additional Summon, not 2.
